name: Where's My Sandwich
description:
-------IMPORTANT-------

Please play game on fullscreen since the position for it was made for fullscreen only. 

To PAUSE the game - don't use fullscreen and click [ESC] button. 

To see the process and behind the scenes of making this game, go to - Click Here !

Game Walkthrough - Click Here !

The boss game has some bugs that I just can't fix somehow but in unity, all works just fine. I'm sorry for the inconvenience but I hope you understand. You can still see how the game goes on the boss level by looking it up on the Game Walkthrough link above.
